name: MiniX
description:
⚠️ Rage Warning ⚠️

Use "A" or "D" to move left or right

"Space" to jump

"TAB" to switch ability

   -- "T" to slow time

   -- Double space to double jump

Avoid :

   -- anything that's not square

Objective :

   --Reach the end

Made by Mokarrom [this game was made for "Geojam"]

Devlog coming soon : me on - Youtube
